name: Consumerist Occult
description:
You are a witch. At least, that’s what you and your friends tell yourselves.

In order to prove who is the most witchy of the bunch, you and your rivals will buy stuff to show off how cool you are. However, indulging in capitalism weakens your magical powers. Use your wits and what magic you have left to be the first to prove that you are a Really Cool Witch.

Consumerist Occult is a 4-player game set in a cyberpunk future where you buy items in order to gain the most clout. However, your magical power is depleted by purchasing the useless items you'll be buying. You'll be using the last of your magic to steal from your "friends" and manipulate fashion trends so that you become the coolest witch around.

Play the game here!
